name: The Presidential Dram "I'm Just a Mashbill"
description: Somebody Say Whiskey is proud to present “I’m Just A Mashbill”, a 4+ year 21% rye mashbill from Proof & Wood. The Presidential Dram is a limited-edition, single barrel release to celebrate the Presidential Election and Presidential Inauguration

name: Barrell Private Release "The Frenchie" Armangac Finish
description: Someone Say Whiskey proudly presents: “Frenchie” An 18 year old KY whiskey finished in French Armagnac casks. From the producer: This unique expression was one of only 2 KY whiskey barrels over 18 years in their program and the only one in the finished program this year.

name: Woodford Reserve "RBG" Double Oaked
description: Someone Say Whiskey, in collaboration with the Women of SSW, presents the RBG o honor the legacy of a woman who committed her life to the rule of law and in support of the constitution. Her many contributions to equality, including the advocacy of Paternity time off, make her worthy of such honor.
